channel.title: Black Mesa down for good or?
channel.description: Black Mesa has been unavailable on Steam for the last two days now, steam servers are "too busy, try again later", and apparently this isn't being fixed. Should I just uninstall the game or will you let people play again?

item.title: Black Mesa down for good or?
item.dc:creator: bugfix
item.description:
Crypt19:

Black Mesa isn’t even on Steam yet. Try verifying the SDK 2007 Base cache or defraging/reinstalling it (the Base).

Well it’s launched through Steam isn’t it:retard:
Anyways I verified (no file needed replacing) and it worked again, thanks for your help.

By the way this game is incredible.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa down for good or?
item.dc:creator: Hyperbyte
item.description:
bugfix:

Black Mesa has been unavailable on Steam for the last two days now, steam servers are “too busy, try again later”, and apparently this isn’t being fixed. Should I just uninstall the game or will you let people play again?

This sounds like a problem with your Steam client. Maybe this link has useful information:
https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=4595-wexn-6831

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa down for good or?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
What? Black Mesa isn’t even on Steam yet. Try verifying the SDK 2007 Base cache or defraging/reinstalling it (the Base). It’s working fine for me.
